title: Fernando (Infante D.)
body: He was the son of King D. Duarte and inherited the lordship of the Madeira archipelago from his uncle, Infante D. Henrique, in 1460. He married his cousin, D. Beatriz, daughter of Infante D. João.

Infante D. Henrique: Portuguese navigator, known as the Infante of Sagres.
D. Beatriz: Cousin and wife of Infante D. Fernando.

1460: Inherited the lordship of the Madeira archipelago.
